string-array.name: cheese_responses
string-array.item: I\'m afraid we never have that at the end of the week, sir. We get it fresh on Monday.
Ah. It\'s been on order, sir, for two weeks. I was expecting it this morning.
Normally, sir, yes. Today the van broke down.
Yes, sir. It\'s, ah ..... it\'s a bit runny.
Well, it\'s very runny, actually, sir.
I think it\'s a bit runnier than you\'ll like it, sir.
